name: WP-Cradle-Theme
description: A WordPress barebone starter theme. Easy Peasy.
author: Picapoint

scripts.build:css: autoprefixer && node-sass --output-style compressed assets/styles/scss/style.scss assets/styles/styles.min.css && node-sass --output-style compressed assets/styles/scss/login.scss assets/styles/login.min.css
scripts.build:js: jshint assets/scripts/js && browserify assets/scripts/js/main.js > assets/scripts/scripts.js && uglifyjs assets/scripts/scripts.js --compress --source-map
